titles: The case betvveen the Right Honourable City of London, and Robert Campion. Represented to publike view, after sixteen years private sad sufferings, and attendance, early and late, upon the several Lord Mayors, aldermen, and common-councels, without relief.
notes: Includes: The humble petition of Robert Campion.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Debts, Public --  England --  London --  Early works to 1800.
